tool_description: The Recognition APIs is a web-based service that recognizes by detecting text, vehicle plate standards, or any type of object inside image content. The cloud APIs service is easy to integrate into your application via REST service. It is a completely free and also open-source project.
name: Recognition APIs
title: Recognition APIs

api_list.name: Recognize objects by url
api_list.description: HTTP GET API which recognizes objects inside an image provided by URL value in the query string.

api_list.name: Recognize plate by url
api_list.description: HTTP GET API which recognizes vehicle plate standards inside an image provided by URL value in the query string.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: An image containing the vehicle plate which wants to be identified.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Select the language you want OCR uses to analyze the image content. By default the English ('eng') language is selected.

optional_parameters.name: ocrEngine
optional_parameters.description: Select the engine you want for OCR engine. By default the 'TesseractLstmCombined' engine is selected.

api_list.name: Recognize text by url
api_list.description: HTTP GET API which recognizes text standards inside an image provided by URL value in the query string.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: An text image which wants to be identified.

optional_parameters.name: ocrOutput
optional_parameters.description: Select the OCR output text type you want. By default the 'UTF8Text' type is selected.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Select the language you want OCR uses to analyze the image content. By default the English ('eng') language is selected.

optional_parameters.name: ocrEngine
optional_parameters.description: Select the engine you want for OCR engine. By default the 'TesseractLstmCombined' engine is selected.
